attributes.action: Liverpool shouldn’t be awarded the title if the Premier League is cancelled
attributes.background:
It is being touted that if the premier league is cancelled due to Covid-19 then the title will be gifted to Liverpool. 

A season is 38 games long and the winner is the team with the most points after every team has played each other twice. 

We call for parliament to block this disgrace

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the Football Association.
